Package Screens

Class GameScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • Screens.Screen
      • Screens.GameScreen
  • public class GameScreen
extends Screen
    The GameScreen class combines all the Sprites together to run the actual game.
    Author:
    Kyle Fu

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static boolean DEBUG_MODE
      Whether the game is in debug mode.
      static int MAX_SPEED
      The max speed of players (independent for each direction).
      static int NUM_WINS
      The number of round wins required to win a game.
      static boolean RECORD_PATH
      Whether the runner path should be recorded.
      static int RESPAWN_DELAY
      The respawn delay of the hunter, in frames.
      static double ROTATE_SPEED
      The rotation speed of the runner, in radians.

      • GameScreen

        public GameScreen​(int width,

        height - The screen height

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Sets up the screen. Do not call this method manually.
        Overrides:
        setup in class Screen

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the game state. Automatically called by draw().

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Updates and draws the GameScreen. Automatically called once per frame.
        Overrides:
        draw in class Screen

        public void spawnObstacle​(int x,
                          int y,

                          int height)
        Spawns an obstacle.
        Parameters:
        x - center x coordinate
        y - center y coordinate
        width - width of sprite
        height - height of sprite

        public void spawnHealthPickup​(int x,
                              int y,
                              int width,
                              int height,
                              int health)

        Parameters:
        x - center x coordinate
        y - center y coordinate
        width - width of sprite
        height - height of sprite
        health - the health the object provides when picked up

        y - center y coordinate

        money - cash the money object provides when picked up

      • spawnGoal

        public void spawnGoal​(int x,
                      int y,
                      int width,
                      int height)
        Spawns the goal. Should be called only once, at the end of the round.
        Parameters:
        x - center x coordinate
        y - center y coordinate
        width - width of sprite
        height - height of sprite

      • prepareRound

        public void prepareRound()
        Prepares a new round of the game, and then switches to the shop menu. Call this when starting a new round.
